title: PLEASE HELP>>>>>Can't get into the client
body:
I haven't been able to get on to league in the past few days. Every time I try to log in, there's a long delay, followed by the error message for not being able to connect to PVP.net (NA servers). I've checked out and run through all the suggestions at "https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944" but it still hasn't resolved itself. The problem is occurring both on wireless (wifi running at around 50mbps) and wired (ethernet at around 1 Gbps) connections.

Any help is very much appreciated.

this is the message that comes up.
http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1424297844498/gg.png

replies.body: It looks your network is having a connection problem and can't connect to the login servers.  I do appreciate the troubleshooting done so far, and I recommedn that you go through every step in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up for good!  Let me know if you have any questions.
